properties.name: David Fowden
properties.description: Posted by MenmediaI was born and raised in Glossop and attended Whitfield C of E Primary and the old Grammar School. My mother, who recently passed away at a grand old age, came from a fairly big Glossop family but now I have no close relatives in the area. I\'ve lost contact with all my old school friends but increasingly I think of them. I\'d be delighted to get some news of old friends and perhaps exchange emails with them. I\'ve been in Australia for over 35 years and left the Grammar School in 1963. David Fowden, Townsville, Australia

properties.name: David Hadfield
properties.description: Posted by MenmediaAlthough not born in Glossop (Broadbottom lad) spent many happy times there and always happy to visit if I get chance to return to the UK. Used to ride (!) for Glossop Velo and still race even out here at age of 57! Love to hear from anyone who remembers me. Webby (Phil Webster) and Spud Walker, where are you? David Hadfield, Dubai, UAE

properties.name: David Hargreaves
properties.description: Posted by MenmediaJust wondering if anyone reading this will remember me. I was born & lived in Glossop until 1968, then moved to South Africa. I started school at Whitfield School upto 1957 and then from 1957 untill 1961 West End Secondary Modern. Always lived on the Whitfield side of town. David Hargreaves, Durban South Africa

properties.name: Dick Whittington
properties.description: Posted by MenmediaI was born in Glossop in 1936. Lived in Hope St, Old Glossop. Attended The Duke of Norfolk\'s Primary and Glossop Grammar. Emigrated to Aust in 1961. Moved to Germany in 1974. Dick Whittington, Essen Germany

properties.name: Erika Hankins
properties.description: Posted by MenmediaI was born and raised in Glossop and was a resident there from 1952 to 1972. My husband and I have been living in Australia since 1977 with our two \'dinkie-di\' children, aged 19 and 15. I am interested to know if anyone from my school days or Glossop remembers me. Erika Hankins, Brisbane, Australia

properties.name: Geoff Williams
properties.description: Posted by MenmediaI attended Glossop Grammar School 1940-1945. Geoff Williams, Weymouth

properties.name: Janet Hall
properties.description: Posted by MenmediaI want to find if my great uncle Joe Hall who got married locally if he had any children around Glossop. Joe Hall married Louisa Mary Leight in 1908 or 1907? Janet Hall, Bath

properties.name: Juleen Clarke
properties.description: Posted by MenmediaI left Glossop in 1980 with my family, Roger, Stephanie, Karen and Nicholas to live in Brisbane Aust. I nursed at Woods Hospital, and Partington, lived in 28 Shawfield Road, Hadfield for 12 years. Worked for Mundet Tipping and Mottram Church School. Kids went to St.Andrews Hadfield school. Happiest memories of our life in Glossop. Juleen Clarke, Australia

properties.name: Ruth Lupton
properties.description: Posted by MenmediaEbeneezer, Frank and Samuel Lupton lived in Hadfield, Glossop in the 1920\'s. Do any of their families still live in the area please? Ruth Lupton, Auckland New Zealand

properties.name: Steven and Marjorie Willis
properties.description: Posted by Menmedia
